posts.post_content: By sacrificing a forest or plains, it pumps itself and puts ANY land into play. You'll never be mana screwed with this fellow. He plays well with [Worm Harvest](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Worm Harvest) and Dredge. [Lord of Extinction](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lord of Extinction), [Terravore](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Terravore), and [Ghastly Demise](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ghastly Demise) love this card as well.
posts.html:
By sacrificing a forest or plains, it pumps itself and puts ANY land into play. You'll never be mana screwed with this fellow. He plays well with Worm Harvest and Dredge. Lord of Extinction, Terravore, and Ghastly Demise love this card as well.
Report Abuse  
Posted By: Vinifera7 (8/14/2009 7:34:06 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
This little lady goes beautifully with the new Zendikar fetch lands and [Lotus Cobra](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lotus Cobra).  
Because Knight does not specify basic lands, any landfall abilities you currently have on the field can be procced twice, and being able to tap that plains/forest for 1 mana before saccing is just that little bit she needed to give herself 5/5
